patthana14.22:1.1: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana14.22:2.1: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.22:3.1: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca.)
